The user first punches the opponent four times, sending them crashing into a large boulder. The user then jumps onto the boulder, and uses the 1000 Metre Punch on the opponent, sending them flying far away, and the boulder crumbling to pieces.

[[es:Colapso del Cielo]]
[[pl:Tenhō]]
